item.title: Use Github Actions to Deploy Hugo Blog
item.author: aaron0219@gmail.com (Aaron)
item.description: üåïBuild up Hugo Blog to Github Page Auto. git: 2.18.4-2.el8_2 git: 2.24.1.windows.2 hugo: v0.75.1 ‚òÄÔ∏èGithub setting 1. Create a Github account Goto Github for sign up a account 2. Create Personal access tokens Create a personal access tokens for deploy github pages i. In main page, Goto Settings ii. Select Developer settings, then select Personal access tokens iii. Click Generate new token button iv. Type Note and select repo:status & public_repo only, then Click Update token
